name: Contemporary Bench in Primitivist Style, Solid Oak and Wool Bouclé, Italy

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Architecturally refined and rooted in artisanal tradition, this contemporary bench in primitivist style is meticulously crafted from solid oak wood and upholstered in premium wool bouclé, offering a sophisticated interplay of texture and materiality. The composition features three individually structured backrests that provide sculptural depth, harmonized by a unified seating surface designed for both aesthetics and functionality. A testament to Italian craftsmanship, this piece seamlessly integrates into high-end interiors, gallery settings, and curated design spaces, bridging the dialogue between primitive inspiration and modern execution. Measurements: W 122 x D 53 x H 105 cm Every item LA Studio offers is checked by our team of 10 craftsmen in our in-house workshop. Special restoration or reupholstery requests can be done. Lighting can be electrified to the required voltage. Every piece design of LA Studio or new production as they are made with natural materials or made by artisans they may vary in wood color, marble color or wood grain, etc. Take into account that the colors on the furniture may vary depending on the type of lighting and the type of screen from which you see the images.
